title: Mascot cam: Villa v Blues
content:
Alternative footage from derby showdown. 
23rd Sep 2015 
  

Relive the stunning Second City derby atmosphere from a very different perspective with our mascot cam. 
 
Our video team attached a GoPro camera to one of the mascots ahead of the Villa v Blues Capital One Cup tie. 
 
Check out the clip below to see the amazing footage. 
 
The young mascot walked out from the tunnel alongside skipper Micah Richards. 
 
The footage captures the incredible atmosphere inside Villa Park as the two teams made their way out ahead of the big game. 
 
Watch the video now in the player below. 
[embedded content]
